data.title: Wilhelm Wien *13 Jan 1864 †30 Aug 1928
data.meta_description: Remembering giants in physics - German Physicist - Worked in Helmholtz lab -1896 determined (Wien law) distribution of blackbody radiation - Wien's displacement law -Founder of mass spectometry - 1911 NobelPrize/PhysicS NobelLaureate in Physics
